Description: Body sherd of large Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black (mostly worn); exterior: on left, possibly chest of undetermined figure to right; at right, bull (part of tail and hind leg remaining) to right; part of elaborate rosette and part of swastika as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0445) (phase 2)
